title: Katie Price hopes for a lucky Euromillions lottery win as she faces bankruptcy
text:
Katie Price is hoping she’s quids in (Picture: Backgrid)

Katie Price is hoping she’s quids in after being pictured getting a couple of lines on the Euromillions lottery.

Following earlier October’s record-breaking EuroMillions win, it seems like a prime time to chance your luck and enter the draw again so it’s no wonder Katie is feeling lucky.

The reality star was snapped on Thursday – ahead of Friday’s draw – and was all smiles holding her tickets in hand despite reports claiming the star is facing bankruptcy.

Katie, who is back with ex-boyfriend Kris Boyson, entered into an ongoing Individual Voluntary Arrangement with debtors in 2018.

It reportedly allowed her to pay £12,000 a month over the course of four years.

Katie Price tries her luck with a Euromillions draw (Picture: Backgrid)

But a bankruptcy petition was placed on the IVA, and at a hearing at the Insolvency and Companies Court on Monday, Judge Sally Barber ordered the 41-year-old to be served with a draft petition notice within seven days.

‘Technically it’s not an adjournment so I’m extending time,’ said Judge Barber.

‘Service will be effective on the expiry of seven days of completion of such sending of the email and such posting.’

The reality star was snapped on Thursday ahead of Friday’s draw (Picture: Backgrid)

A bankruptcy petition is an application to the court for someone’s assets to be taken and sold to pay their debts.

Mr Taylor from JMW Solicitors told the judge he had been in email contact with Katie but alleged that she had failed to attend an appointment with her creditors.

The winning numbers were picked on 18 October (Picture: Backgrid)

Mother-of-five Katie has fallen on tough financial times and in 2018 put the West Sussex mansion on the market, as well as attempting to sell a £100k Audi once bought second-hand for ex-husband Kieran Hayler.

She also admitted to staging paid photoshoots with paps.

In 2016, Katie revealed she was not always great at managing her money.

The personality said: ‘Some people are very careful and they plan for the future or they pay their bills on time. I don’t. I have bailiffs at my door all the time.’
